name: Doraemon Learning Collection
summary:
Doraemon Learning Collection includes the following Doraemon learning games in-one. - Dora Kazu: Nobita no Suuji Daibouken 
- Dora Chie: Mini-Dora Ongakutai to 7-tsu no Chie 
- Dora Eigo: Nobita to Yousei no Fushigi Collection 
- Dora Moji: Nobita no Kanji Daibouken
